<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns whether a global or its associated global has attached type</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// metadata. The former may participate in CFI or whole-program</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// devirtualization, so they need to appear in the merged module instead of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the thin LTO module. Similarly, globals that are associated with globals</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with type metadata need to appear in the merged module because they will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reference the global&#39;s section directly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect the set of virtual functions that are eligible for virtual constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// propagation. Each eligible function must not access memory, must return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an integer of width &lt;=64 bits, must take at least one argument, must not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use its first argument (assumed to be &quot;this&quot;) and all arguments other than</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the first one must be of &lt;=64 bit integer type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that we test whether this copy of the function is readnone, rather</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// than testing function attributes, which must hold for any copy of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function, even a less optimized version substituted at link time. This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sound because the virtual constant propagation optimizations effectively</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inline all implementations of the virtual function into each call site,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rather than using function attributes to perform local optimization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;const Function &#42;&gt;</a> EligibleVirtualFns;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If any member of a comdat lives in MergedM, put all members of that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// comdat in MergedM to keep the comdat together.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
